{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3557959,"name":"","username":"zSam","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/zsam/{size}/198455_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-16T00:02:15.771Z","cooked":"

I am trying to code an auto alignment command that will allow the driver to just align with the reef or coral intake automatically. I am using an Orange PI with PhotonVision and an Arducam OV9281 for the vision system. I used Phoenix Tuner X to auto generate the swerve code, and I do not understand how it works.

I am lost as to how I can have the swerve drive align with the field based on the vision system. I have read docs and tried the examples but I believe I still do not understand.

This is the current code: GitHub - frc-6901/2025-Reefscape

Thanks for the help.
